description: A lead designer proposes how to split the responsibilities for creating the promotional poster for a high-profile art exhibition, while the assisting designer decides whether to accept or reject the proposed workload division. If rejected, the exhibition's advertising suffers, impacting both designers.

proposer_behavior_choices.generous_proposal: Take on 80% of the workload themselves and assign only 20% to the assistant.
proposer_behavior_choices.fair_proposal: Split the work equally, 50% for each.
proposer_behavior_choices.stingy_proposal: Assign 70% of the workload to the assistant, keeping only 30% for themselves.

responder_behavior_choices.accept: Agree to the proposed workload and complete the poster.
responder_behavior_choices.reject: Turn down the proposal, delaying the poster design and affecting the event's success.
